Subject: Inclusion of the name of Harcourt Butler Technical University Kanpur under
Section 12-B of the UGC Act, 1956 - Regarding.

Sir,

This has reference to the proposal and further compliances submitted by the
University for the grant of 12-B status under Section 12-B of the UGC Act, 1956. In this
regard, it is informed that the Commission has approved the 12-B status and inclusion of
the name of Harcourt Butler Technical University, Kanpur â€” 208 002, Uttar Pradesh
under Section 12-B of the UGC Act, 1956.

Further, it is advised to regularly update the data of students on the ABC and NAD
portals, address the grievances received on the E-Samadhan Portal at the earliest and
also participate in NIRF. i
